nodes.text: Star Wars Omnibus: Tales of the Jedi, Volume 2
Omnibus: Tales of the Jedi, Volume 2 is the fifth Star Wars Omnibus by Dark Horse, collecting several issues of the Tales of the Jedi comics.
Learn the fate of the ancient Jedi Order's most legendary heroes in this huge collection!

In a time when Jedi were numerous and the Sith Empire but a bitter memory, an ancient evil rose again, corrupting one of the Jedi's finest and igniting a war that ravaged worlds. The Sith were reborn, ties of friendship and family were betrayed, and the lives of Jedi Nomi Sunrider and Ulic Qel-Droma were changed forever.
Nearly four thousand years before the birth of Luke Skywalker, the galaxy faces its greatest threat since the founding of the Galactic Republic.

In a time when Jedi were numerous and the Sith Empire but a bitter memory, an ancient evil rose again, corrupting one of the Jedi's finest and igniting a war that ravaged worlds. The Sith were reborn, ties of friendship and family were betrayed, and the course of the galaxy's future is forever altered.
